subject: Police
Perjury
Football
lead_paragraph: Police union officials want an investigation of the father of Green Bay Packers receiver Donald Driver, saying he lied about a police beating and being forced to swallow cocaine. The union sent a letter to the Harris County district attorney requesting a perjury investigation of Marvin Driver Jr. after an internal investigation cleared three officers of wrongdoing in the arrest.
